text: Česlovas Vytautas Stankevičius (born 27 February 1937) is a Lithuanian politician. In 1990, he was one of the signers of the Act of the Re- Establishment of the State of Lithuania. He was the Minister of Defence between 1996 to 2000. During that same time, he was a member of Seimas. He was born in Vilkaviškis District Municipality, Lithuania. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Seimas
title: Česlovas Stankevičius
